All Classes

Class Description
Action
Action Class defines common Data and Methods to perform an action on the model after a Client's request.
ActionController
ActionController Class contains all that is needed to compute an Action sent by the Client and to create a MessageToClient message containing a response.
ActionType
ActionType enum Class contains definitions for every possible Action coming from a Client to the Server.
ActivateLeaderCard
ActivateLeaderCard Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client request regarding Leader Card activation.
ActivateLeaderCardMessage
ActivateLeaderCardMessage Class defines methods and attributes to update the Client's View after a ActivateLeaderCard Action.
ActivateProduction
ActivateProduction Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client request regarding Production activation.
ActivateProductionMessage
ActivateProductionMessage Class defines methods and attributes to update the Client's View after a ActivateProduction Action.
AddMessage
AddMessage Class contains data for a response message to be sent to the client after an AddResource action.
AddResource
AddResource Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client request when adding a resource from the Market into his Warehouse.
ANSIColors
Used as a Shortcut for getting ANSI colors
ANSIDebug
ANSIDebug abstract Class contains colors and styles to be used by the Debugger Classes when printing debug information.
ANSIfont
Used for getting ANSI font codes in cli-like interfaces
BasicProduction
BasicProduction Class defines inputs and outputs of a basic production.
Board
Board Class contains all parts defining the playing board for each Player.
BoughtCardMessage
BoughtCardMessage Class defines methods and attributes to update the Client's View after a PayResourceBuyCard Action (if the player has finished paying for the card).
BuyCard
BuyCard Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client's request when buying a card from the DevelopmentCardTable.
BuyCardMessage
BuyCardMessage Class contains data for a response message to be sent to the client after a BuyCard request.
CardSlot
CardSlot Class defines methods of a RedCardSlot object to be used only on the Model.
CheatMessage
CheatMessage Class contains data and methods to use when a Player performs a Cheat Action.
ChooseCardSlot
ChooseCardSlot Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client's request when choosing a card slot to put the just bought DevelopmentCard.
ChooseLeaderCard
ChooseLeaderCard Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client request regarding Leader Card choice when buying a white marble from the market.
ChooseProductionOutput
ChooseProductionOutput Class contains data and methods to be used when the player concluded payment for a Production to choose the Production output.
ChoseCardSlotMessage
ChoseCardSlotMessage Class contains data for a response message to be sent to the client after a ChooseCardSlot request.
ChoseLeaderCardMessage
ChoseLeaderCardMessage Class contains data for a response message to be sent to the client after a ChooseLeaderCard request.
ChoseMarketRowMessage
ChoseMarketRowMessage Class defines a response to be sent to the client after a MarketChooseRow request.
ChoseProductionOutputMessage
ChooseProductionOutputMessage Class defines a response message to be sent to the client after a ChooseProductionOutput request.
Cli
Cli Class contains methods and attributes used to run the user's Cli Interface as a separate Thread.
CliCheatController
Handles the cheat interaction available only in cli mode
CliController
Cli Class contains all methods needed to show and parse the player's input into an Action object to be sent to the Server.
CliControllerDebugger
CliControllerDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a CliController Object.
CliDebugger
CliDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a Cli Object.
Client
The client handles the opening of the desired interface and than handles the connection to the server
ClientConnection
ClientConnection handles the listening of messages from the server.
ClientConnectionDebugger
ClientConnectionDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a ClientConnection Object.
ClientDebugger
ClientDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a Client Object.
ClientExceptionHandler
Handles some validation and all the error messages in the Gui
Color
Color enum-type Class contains all possible colors a Development Card (or Development Card Deck) can have.
Controller
Controller Class observes messages coming from the Client to compute them as soon as they are notified by a serverConnection object (which extends Observable).
ControllerDebugger
ControllerDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a Controller Object.
ConvertToJSON
ConvertToJSON Class contains all the methods to convert from java objects to JSON files.
Debugger
Debugger Class defines common data and methods used to print debugging information.
DebuggerFactory
DebuggerFactory Class contains a method used to generate a Debugger sub-class.
DebuggerType
Defines all possible Debuggers which can be used by the Program.
DevCardsCheat
DevCardsCheat Class is a special Action to be used when Cheat Mode is enabled to give Development Cards to the player.
DevelopmentCard
DevelopmentCard Class describes the different methods needed for the creation and usage of a Development Card inside the Model.
DevelopmentCardDeck
DevelopmentCardDeck Class defines methods to be used on Development Card Deck objects inside the Model.
DevelopmentCardDeckJSON
DevelopmentCardDeckJSON is a class used to write on JSON files
DevelopmentCardJSON
DevelopmentCardJSON is a class used to write on JSON files
DevelopmentCardSlots
DevelopmentCardSlots Class defines methods used on the Model to modify the player's Development Card Slots.
DevelopmentCardTable
DevelopmentCardTable Class contains all 12 Development Card decks available for the player to buy.
DiscardLeaderCard
DiscardLeaderCard class contains data and methods to resolve a Client request regarding Leader Card discard action.
DiscardLeaderCardMessage
DiscardLeaderMessage Class defines a response message to be sent to a client after a DiscardLeader Action request.
DisconnectedMessage
DisconnectedMessage Class defines a message to be sent to all clients ONLY if the player who disconnected from the game was the one currently playing.
EndMarket
EndMarket Class contains data and methods to use when a player wants to end a market interaction, transforming Resources into Faith Points.
EndMarketMessage
EndMarketMessage Class defines a response message to be sent to the client after a EndMarket request.
EndProductionMessage
EndProductionMessage Class defines methods and attributes to update the Client's View after a PayResourceProduction Action.
EndTurn
EndTurn class defines methods to end a player's turn and go to the next one (if the game is Multiplayer)
EndTurnMessage
EndTurnMessage Class defines a response message to be sent to a client after an EndTurn request.
EndTurnSingleplayerMessage
EndTurnSingleplayerMessage Class defines a response message to be sent to a client after an EndTurn request when playing a Singleplayer game.
ExceptionMessage
ExceptionMessage Class defines a special message to be sent to the players when an exception is caught internally by the Server.
FaithCell
FaithCell Class includes new methods for a Faith Cell to be used on the Model
FaithTrack
FaithTrack Class includes new methods of the Faith Track to be used on the game's Faith Track.
FaithTrackCheat
FaithTrackCheat Class is a special Action to be used when Cheat Mode is enabled to give Faith Points to the player.
FinalPointsMessage
FinalPointsMessage Class defines a response message to be sent to a client after the game ended.
Game
Game Class contains all attributes and methods needed when creating an instance of a new Game.
Game
Game Class contains all attributes needed when creating an instance of a new game inside the user's View.
GameSetMessage
GameSetMessage Class defines attributes and methods needed to correctly create a copy of the Model's Game inside the Client's View.
GameStatus
GameStatus contains all the possible status the server can have during the gameplay.
GameType
GameType Enum Class contains definitions to be used by the game to know if it's in Singleplayer or Multiplayer mode.
Gui
Gui class handles the opening of the javaFx window
GuiBoardController
GuiBoardController handles all the gui interactions related with the user's interaction with the Game via the Board.
GuiInitController
GuiInitController is the Class that contains all the methods used for the implementation of the JavaFX gui for the first screens up until before the Board is created.
InitChooseLeaderCards
InitChooseLeaderCards Class defines data and methods used to give to the player the two Leader Cards he chooses at the beginning of the game.
InitChooseResources
InitChooseResources Class defines data and methods used to give to the player the initial resources he chooses at the beginning of the game.
InitChoseLeaderCardsMessage
InitChoseLeaderCards Class defines a response message to be sent to a client after an InitChooseLeaderCards Action request.
InitChoseResourcesMessage
InitChoseResources Class defines a response message to be sent to a client after an InitChooseResources Action request.
InputController
InputController Class is used to check the input given by the player to ensure that the Controller can operate on the messages without Runtime errors.
JSONReader
JSONReader Class contains all the methods needed to read a .json file whenever it is necessary.
LeaderCard
There are 4 types of Leader Card, depending on the type of special effect they apply on the Game.
LeaderCardAction
Four Leader Card actions, byte based
LeaderCardJSONAbility
LeaderCardJSONAbility is a class used to write on JSON files
LeaderCardsCheat
LeaderCardsCheat Class is a special Action to be used when Cheat Mode is enabled to activate all of the player's leaderCards.
LeaderCardShuffle
Invoked at the start of the game this class shuffles the Leader Cards for the players to chose
LeaderRequirements
Defines a Card with the characteristics required from Leader Card; a Level and a Colour.
Level
Level enum-type Class contains all possible levels a Development Card (or Development Card Deck) can have.
Marble
Marble colours, used in Market and LeaderCards
Market
Market Class defines the contents and behaviour of the game's market.
MarketChooseRow
MarketChooseTow Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client request regarding Market shopping.
MarketJSON
MarketJSON is a class used to write on JSON files
MessageToClient
MessageToClient Class defines a generic message to be sent to the Client (via the Serializable Java interface).
ModelDebugger
ModelDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a Model Object.
ModelException
The Model Exception is used for all the model related exceptions
ModelToView
ModelToView Class contains methods used to notify a MessageToClient
Observable<T>
Observable Class defines functionality and methods needed for a Class to be observed by a number of Observers.
Observer<T>
Observer Interface contains a method to be called by an Observable when a new event occurs.
PaymentMessage
PaymentMessage Class defines a response message to be sent to a client after a generic PayResource Action request.
PayResource
PayResource Class defines data and methods to complete a Client's request when paying for a production or a Development Card.
PayResourceBuyCard
PayResourceBuyCard Class extends PayResource Class to diversify messages going to the Client for a better response management.
PayResourceProduction
PayResourceProduction Class extends PayResource Class to diversify messages going to the Client for a better response management.
Persistence
Persistence Class contains attributes and methods used by the Server to remember all information needed when restarting the Server.
PersistenceServerController
PersistenceServerController Class is used by the server to reset itself if it stopped and not enough players connected after five minutes.
Player
Player Class defines attributes and methods of a player.
Player
Player Class defines attributes and methods of a player.
PlayerJSON
PlayerJSON is a class used to write on JSON files
PlayerStatus
PlayerStatus enum-type Class contains all possible statuses a player could have while playing the game.
PopeSpace
Color enum-type Class contains all possible colors a Development Card (or Development Card Deck) can have.
PopeTile
Pope tile enum-type Class contains all possible positions for that a PopeTile can have as per Game rules.
PopeTileClass
PopeTileClass Class adds methods to Pope Tiles to be used on the Model.
RedBasicProduction
BasicProduction Class defines inputs and outputs of a basic production.
RedCardSlot
RedCardSlot Class contains attributes and methods defining a Development Card slot in the user's View.
RedDevelopmentCard
RedDevelopmentCard Class describes the different attributes and methods needed for the creation of a Development Card.
RedDevelopmentCardDeck
RedDevelopmentCardDeck Class contains three private attributes: an array of DevelopmentCards, a color and a level.
RedDevelopmentCardSlots
RedDevelopmentCardSlots Class defines data and methods of the Development Card Slots of the user's reduced game.
RedDevelopmentCardTable
RedDevelopmentCardTable Class contains all 12 Development Card decks available for the player to buy.
RedFaithCell
RedFaithCell Class contains data and methods used to create a faith cell inside the user's view.
RedFaithTrack
RedFaithTrack Class contains data and methods for the faithTrack.
RedLeaderCard
There are 4 types of Leader Card, depending on the type of special effect they apply on the Game.
RedLeaderRequirements
Defines a Card with the characteristics required from Leader Card; a Level and a Colour.
RedMarket
Market Class defines the contents and behaviour of the game's market.
RedPopeTileClass
Contains all the information regarding a PopeTile
RedResourceStack
ResourceStack Class contains four integer private attributes indicating the amount of each different type of resource: shields, servants, coins, stones.
RedStrongbox
Strongbox Class defines the contents and the behaviour of the strongbox inside the player's board.
RedVaticanReportSection
Reduced Vatican Report Class
RedWarehouse
Warehouse Class defines the contents and the behaviour of the warehouse inside the player's board.
RedWarehouseDepot
WarehouseDepot Class defines the single warehouse's depot.
ResetWarehouse
ResetWarehouse Class contains data and methods to complete a Client's request when wanting to reset his warehouse to initial conditions (when adding resources).
ResetWarehouseMessage
ResetWarehouseMessage Class contains data for a response message to be sent to the client after a ResetWarehouse request.
ResourceManager
ResourceManager Class contains both a Warehouse and a Strongbox type objects (as final attributes).
ResourceStack
ResourceStack Class contains four integer private attributes indicating the amount of each different type of resource: shields, servants, coins, stones.
ResourceType
ResourceType Enum Class contains all possible types of resources of the game.
Server
Handles the connections to new clients, keeping an HashSet of active Names and active Sockets The default parameters are set to port 8765.
ServerConnection
ServerConnection is a thread running on the server that manages connection to and from the clients.
ServerConnectionDebugger
ServerConnectionDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a ServerConnection Object.
ServerDebugger
ServerDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a Server Object.
ServerMessageHandler
ServerMessageHandler Class handles the majority of interactions held between the Client and the Server.
ServerMessageHandlerDebugger
ServerMessageHandlerDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a ServerMessageHandler Object.
SinglePlayer
SinglePlayer Class contains data and methods used by the Model when playing a singleplayer game.
SoloActionToken
Different Action Tokens for the SinglePlayer game
SoloActionTokenDeck
SoloActionTokenDeck Class defines a deck object where all SoloActionTokens of the singleplayer game are stored.
Strongbox
Strongbox Class defines the contents and the behaviour of the strongbox inside the player's board.
StrongboxCheat
StrongBoxCheat Class is a special Action to be used when Cheat Mode is enabled to give Victory Points to a player.
SwitchDepot
SwitchDepot Class defines data and methods to complete a Client's request when wanting to switch two depots during an Add interaction.
SwitchDepotMessage
SwitchDepotMessage Class contains data for a response message to be sent to the client after a SwitchDepot request.
UIActions
Enum class containing all the actions that the server can send to the client.
UserInteraction
UserInteraction Class contains what a client needs to view the game being played and to access methods to interact with the View to generate messages to be sent to the server.
UserInterface
UserInterface Interface defines methods Overridden by both Cli and Gui classes to be used to get the user input, ready to be sent to the server via the UserInteraction Abstract Class.
VaticanReportSection
VaticanReportSection Class adds methods to be used on Vatican Report Sections on the Model.
VaticanReportSectionEnum
Color enum-type Class contains all possible colors a Development Card (or Development Card Deck) can have.
VictoryPointsCheat
VictoryPointsCheat Class is a special Action to be used when Cheat Mode is enabled to give Victory Points to a player.
Warehouse
Warehouse Class defines the contents and the behaviour of the warehouse inside the player's board.
WarehouseDepot
WarehouseDepot Class defines the single warehouse's depot.
